title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Theatre
purpose: To support the resilience and relevance of theatre in the UK for audiences, society and the industry. To identify and debate potential opportunities and issues for theatre in the UK. To support parliamentariansâ€™ understanding of the theatre and performing arts industry at a national and local level.
